201701150005.question: You are a high school student. You just finished the last one of your final exam. In this summer vacation you plan to [  ]

201701150029.question: Australia is a wonderful place. After making that decision,you buy a flight ticket with [  ]

201701161647.question: Overwatch is so fun that you addict to it. After playing for 48 hours without sleeping, you die. [ENDING: Game Star]

201701161648.question: On the way to the party, you die because of a severe car accident. [ENDING: Drive Faster]

201701161735.question: It's a ticket of economy class.

201701161737.question: It's a ticket of first class. You enjoy the delicious food and have a good rest. Suddenly you hear "Ladies and Gentlemen,we are experiencing some turbulence,please return to your seat and fasten your seat belt.Thank you." [  ]

201701182123.question: The plane crashes. You die immediately. [ENDING: Calm Forever]
